title: Integrative Naturopathic Medicine San Luis Obispo and Orange County
description: Integrative naturopathic medical doctor serving Orange County, San Luis Obispo, and Santa Barbara California.
cleaned_text: Natural medicine is a holistic, gentle, preventative approach to medicine which aims to address the underlying cause(s) to your most pertinent health concerns. Guided by these naturopathic principles, we optimize your biochemistry and physiology resulting in optimal health, wellness and longevity for years to come.
